name: WEC: world eggstling championship
description:
Its time to fight, you control an egg and try to destroy the monster eggs. You need to jump on top of the monster eggs to destroy them and be the king of the nest.May the best egg win.

Controls-

left-left half of the screen

right right half of the screen

jump- top half of the screen

disclaimer-

This game is the result of my hardwork . Its not completed yet but I'm working on it.So if you have any suggestions lemme know.
